info.name: About Blank Nyan Cat Firefox
info.description:
Please read the following text
It is possible that the style does not work: it only works on the URL 'about:blank'. You must go to the following URL 'about:config' and search 'about:' in the search bar. Then double-click the address that should be 'about:newtab' and type 'about:blank' then click 'ok'. If you have an other problem with this style, Contact me
